channel.title: Too many hackers
channel.description:
These days just arent as good as they used too be, hackers are around the corner on every site..I've recently been checking my Firewall security risks, 33 people since 1st of june have ( is when i made my server) have been trying too get into my network/computer..its UNBELIEVEABLE, im forcing my self too QUIT my server and delete it, but im not that mean, i wont delete but i will take it away for good, its horrible what people these days are doing, no wonder over 20,000 people in a month on RS get banned let alone what about Mopar? hmm..its pathetic.
This topic is leading too the advice that needs too be given, when you make you're server, be carfull of what you're dealing with, it could be you're bankaccount or ur RS pass that may be in RISK, TAKE note of what you're doing, let alone the portforwarding, where can i start? its a hackers paradise when someone does it.
BE VERY WARY OF WHAT YOU'RE DOING PEOPLE, THIS ISNT A JOKE.
Thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2007, 02:06:27 AM[/size][hr]I hope some people learn off this. I know the feeling "OMG having a server is going too b AWSOMEZ" Its not as great as you think..2 much too deal with IMO

item.title: Too many hackers
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Deadlypkz:

Yet, so many complain about them getting hacked? im sick of it, i had too put a post out, if you’re going too spam and just say 2 words, then go away.

He said 3 words

Read full topic

[/quote] or like saying u have balls?[/quote]Your just mad i owned you at your half-assed tutorial.
